metadata.title: CVE-2018-10873 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in SPICE before version 0.14.1 where thegenerated code used for demarshalling messages lacked sufficient boundschecks. A malicious client or server, after authentication, could sendspecially crafted messages to its peer which would result in a crash or,potentially, other impacts.

criterions.comment: spice-gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
